title: [BUILD] Building Android Native Assets for libHarfBuzzSharp fails in an error
body:
### Description

When I try to build Android native assets in `native\android` folder using `dotnet cake` **libSkiaSharp** builds ok, but **libHarfBuzzSharp** fails with the following error:

```
========================================
libHarfBuzzSharp
========================================
make: *** No rule to make target 'C:/repos/mono/SkiaSharp/externals/skia/third_party/externals/harfbuzz/src/harfbuzz-subset.cc', needed by 'obj/local/x86/objs/HarfBuzzSharp/C_/repos/mono/SkiaSharp/externals/skia/third_party/externals/harfbuzz/src/harfbuzz-subset.o'.  Stop.
An error occurred when executing task 'libHarfBuzzSharp'.
Error: Process 'C:/Microsoft/AndroidNDK/android-ndk-r23c/ndk-build.cmd' failed with error: 2
```

Any idea how to resolve this error?

I am using the latest code in the SkiaSharp repository (as of 2nd Sep 2023).

### Code

No code.

### Expected Behavior

libHarfBuzzSharp native assets will build.

### Actual Behavior

libHarfBuzzSharp does not build.

### Version of SkiaSharp

Other (Please indicate in the description)

### Last Known Good Version of SkiaSharp

Other (Please indicate in the description)

### IDE / Editor

Visual Studio (Windows)

### Platform / Operating System

Android

### Platform / Operating System Version
